bio: On the path to Optimistic Enlightenment.
impactDescription: My contributions to the Optimism ecosystem have been vital for the growth and success of this Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum. These contributions have come in various forms:  Development; DApps; Security Audits; Documentation and Education; Community Engagement; Integration; Research; and Advocacy and Adoption
